summary: This is an email chain from November 13, 2021, forwarding a news alert about Ghislaine Maxwell giving her first interview from prison to the Daily Mail. The email expresses surprise and potential concern about the reporter's access.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the forwarded news article, having given her first interview from behind bars to the Daily Mail.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes Maxwell prison interview
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article containing Ghislaine Maxwell's first interview from prison.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave her first interview from prison in November 2021.
The interview was conducted by a Daily Mail reporter and published in the Mail on Sunday.
The email chain shows internal communication expressing surprise or concern about the reporter's access to Maxwell.
